sentence.text: ` No diet is easy and I found the first few days hard , but by the end of the first week my skin became clearer , my nails grew stronger and my hair was healthy and shining .

This damsel will reply to any romantic knight in shining armour

Dick was the dayest person you ever saw , shining hair , big smile , dimples , high tenor voice .
